name: Game Console in a Game
description:
Get all the coins to win (and don't kill yourself) Jia You!

Instructions:

  • Left & Right arrows keys/ AD to move
  • SPACE/UP arrow key/W to jump. 

Submission for :

STOP WAITING FOR GODOT

Hosted by Terry Cavanagh · #stopwaitingforgodot

The official (but optional) theme for the jam is: "Keep it Simple" 

(my game is very simple, collect the coins lol)

and

OLC CODEJAM 2021

Hosted by javidx9 · #olcCodeJam2021

THEME: THE FUTURE

Walking Game Console, what do you expect ;)

Who am I?

Just a random tuna on the web :) 

Assets:

Mostly from Kenney and Brackeys. Tutorial learnt from BornCG's "Let's Build a 2D platformer" series. Thank you so much! (including each of you who played my game💗)

Music:

All by Kenney and Brackeys, except the level theme music, which is composed simply made by me lol. Here's the full track: 

Rate if you enjoy it, if you don't then feel free to comment down below so I can improve :)

HELP🙏someone know how to deal with false copyrights?

I did not take any music from the company that claim my video. Please send help.
